00398     class Ctx {
00399     public:
00400         Ctx();
00401         Ctx(int arg_cnt);
00402         ~Ctx();
00404         I32 arg_len() {
00405             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00406         }
00408         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00409             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00410             this->register_allocated(s);
00411             return s;
00412         }
00414         void ret(Scalar s) {
00415             this->ret(0, &s);
00416         }
00417         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00418             this->ret(0, s);
00419         }
00420         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00421             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00422         }
00424         bool wantarray() {
00425             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00426         }
00428         void ret(Array* ary) {
00429             unsigned int size = ary->size();
00430             if (size != 0) {
00431                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00432                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < size) {
00433                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, size);
00434                 }
00435 
00436                 for (unsigned int i=0; i < size; ++i) {
00437                     Scalar * s = ary->fetch(i);
00438                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = s->val;
00439                 }
00440                 ax--;
00441             } else {
00442                 this->return_undef();
00443             }
00444         }
00446         void return_true() {
00447             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00448         }
00450         void return_undef() {
00451             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00452         }
00458         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00459             allocated.push_back(v);
00460         }
00461     protected:
00466         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00467             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00468         }
00469         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00470             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00471         }
00472         void initialize();
00473         I32 ax;
00474         SV ** mark;
00475         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00476     };
00477     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00478     Ctx::Ctx() {
00479         this->initialize();
00480     }
00481     Ctx::Ctx(int arg_cnt) {
00482         this->initialize();
00483 
00484         int got = arg_len();
00485         if (arg_cnt != got) {
00486             Carp::croak("This method requires %d arguments, but %d", arg_cnt, got);
00487         }
00488     }
00489     void Ctx::initialize() {
00490         // same as dAXMARK
00491         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00492         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00493         this->mark = PL_stack_base + this->ax - 1;
00494 
00495         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00496     }
00497     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00498         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00499         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00500             delete *iter;
00501         }
00502 
00503         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00504 
00505         ctxstack.pop_back();
00506     }

00511     class CurCtx {
00512     public:
00513         static Ctx * get() {
00514             if (ctxstack.size() > 0) {
00515                 return ctxstack[ctxstack.size()-1];
00516             } else {
00517                 Carp::croak("Devel::BindPP: missing context");
00518                 throw; // don't reach here
00519             }
00520         }
00521     };

00523     Reference * Reference::new_inc(Value* thing) {
00524         Reference* ref = new Reference(newRV_inc(thing->val));
00525         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00526         return ref;

00529     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00530         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00531         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00532         if (v) {
00533             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00534             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00535             return ref;
00536         } else {
00537             return NULL;
00538         }
00539     }
00540     Reference * Array::fetch(I32 key) {
00541         SV ** v = av_fetch((AV*)this->val, key, 0);
00542         if (v) {
00543             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00544             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00545             return ref;
00546         } else {
00547             return NULL;
00548         }
00549     }
00550     Scalar * Array::pop() {
00551         SV* v = av_pop((AV*)this->val);
00552         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00553         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00554         return s;
00555     }
00556     Scalar * Array::shift() {
00557         SV* v = av_shift((AV*)this->val);
00558         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00559         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00560         return s;
00561     }
00562     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00563         _v->refcnt_inc();
00564         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00565         if (v) {
00566             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00567             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00568             return ref;
00569         } else {
00570             return NULL;
00571         }
00572     }

00598             this->add_constant(name, val.val);
00599         }
00600     protected:

00602             newCONSTSUB(stash, name, val);
00603         }
00604     private:
00605         std::string pkg;
00606         HV * stash;

00612     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00613     public:
00614         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00615             xs_version_bootcheck();
00616         }
00617         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00618             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00619             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00620         }
00621     protected:
00622         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00623         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00624             SV *_sv;
00625             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00626             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00627                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00628                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00629             } else {
00630                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00631                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00632                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00633                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00634                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00635                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00636             }
00637             if (_sv) {
00638                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00639                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00640                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00641                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00642                 }
00643                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00644                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00645                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00646                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00647                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00648                 }
00649             }
00650         }
00651     };
00652 
00656     class Code : public Scalar {
00657     public:
00658         Code(SV * _s) : Scalar(_s) { }
00660         void call(Array * args, Array* retval) {
00661             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00662 
00663             push_scope(); // ENTER
00664             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00665             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00666 
00667             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00668                 markstack_grow();
00669             }
00670             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00671 
00672             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00673                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00674                     // optimize?
00675                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00676                 }
00677                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00678             }
00679             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00680 
00681             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_ARRAY);
00682 
00683             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00684 
00685             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00686                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00687                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00688                 retval->store(i, s);
00689             }
00690 
00691             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00692             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00693                 free_tmps();
00694             }
00695             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00696         }
00698         void call(Array * args, Scalar** retval) {
00699             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00700 
00701             push_scope(); // ENTER
00702             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00703             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00704 
00705             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00706                 markstack_grow();
00707             }
00708             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00709 
00710             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00711                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00712                     // optimize?
00713                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00714                 }
00715                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00716             }
00717             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00718 
00719             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_SCALAR);
00720 
00721             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00722 
00723             if (count != 0) {
00724                 *retval = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00725                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(*retval);
00726             }
00727 
00728             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00729             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00730                 free_tmps();
00731             }
00732             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00733         }
00734     };

00739     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00740     public:
00741         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00743         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00744             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00745                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00746             } else {
00747                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00748             }
00749         }
00750 
00754         template <class T>
00755         T extract() {
00756             return INT2PTR(T, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00757         }
00758     };

00764     class FileTest {
00765     public:
00770         static bool is_regular_file(const char * fname) {
00771             Stat_t buf;
00772             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00773             if (ret == 0 && S_ISREG(buf.st_mode)) {
00774                 return true;
00775             } else {
00776                 return false;
00777             }
00778         }
00783         static bool is_dir(const char * fname) {
00784             Stat_t buf;
00785             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00786             if (ret == 0 && S_ISDIR(buf.st_mode)) {
00787                 return true;
00788             } else {
00789                 return false;
00790             }
00791         }
00792     };

00798     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00799         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00800             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00801             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00802             return s;
00803         } else {
00804             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00805                 "Devel::BindPP",
00806                 "sv");
00807         }
00808     }

00873     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00874         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00875             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00876             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00877             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00878             return hobj;
00879         } else {
00880             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00881                 "Devel::BindPP",
00882                 "hv");
00883         }
00884     }
00885     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00886         SV* v = this->val;
00887         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00888             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00889             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00890             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00891             return obj;
00892         } else {
00893             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00894                 "Devel::BindPP",
00895                 "av");
00896         }
00897     }
00898     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00899         SV* v = this->val;
00900         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00901             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00902             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00903             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00904             return obj;
00905         } else {
00906             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00907                 "Devel::BindPP",
00908                 "sv");
00909         }
00910     }
00911     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00912         SV* v = this->val;
00913         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00914             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00915             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00916             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00917             return obj;
00918         } else {
00919             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00920                 "Devel::BindPP",
00921                 "sv");
00922         }
00923     }
00924 
00925     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00926         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00927         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00928         return ref;
00929     }
00930     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00931         value->refcnt_inc();
00932         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00933         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00934         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00935         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00936         return ref;
00937     }
00938     Scalar* Hash::scalar() {
00939         Scalar*s = new Scalar(hv_scalar((HV*)this->val));
00940         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00941         return s;
00942     }
00943     void Hash::undef() {
00944         hv_undef((HV*)this->val);
00945     }
00946     void Hash::clear() {
00947         hv_clear((HV*)this->val);
00948     }
00949     Boolean* Boolean::yes() {
00950         Boolean* s = new Boolean(true);
00951         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00952         return s;
00953     }
00954     Boolean* Boolean::no() {
00955         Boolean* s = new Boolean(false);
00956         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00957         return s;
00958     }
